title: Mac slow load times
body: I used to load into loading screen pretty fast after champ select. Since the patch it takes almost 3 minutes to get to that screen. Wondering if this is patch related or not? I use a mac and hear there are bugs for mac on this patch. Thanks for any help!

replies.body: Actually same thing is happening to me. It never happened before. The game is running on a SSD so it usually got to 100% on loading screen very quickly. After the patch, when champ select is completed, I get a white screen followed by a loading screen freeze (the little wheel in the corner doesn't move) and only after a few seconds does it start loading normally. I can only assume it's related to the patch since I changed nothing on my computer. The only thing that changed was the patch.

I am actually experiencing this as well. I think it might be related to the other Mac problems that have been in patch 7.9 although my capped 60 FPS seem to have been fixed. I actually think this issue with freezy/slow loading screen came after the 60 FPS cap seemed to disappear.

Hmmmm if it's taking awhile to load the champion loading screen, it could be due to one of two things. Either your pc is just taking a while to get the game to load from hardware issues, or your client is having a hard time getting connected to the game servers. Let's first make sure that your network is able to get a solid connection with our servers by going through [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know how that helps!

I've had the same problem where the connection is showing no ping or packet loss issues. As for the hardware issues, my situation is the same as Tytan294 where I'm running a SSD and the only thing that has changed is the patch. There are no loading issues for any other games/application on the computer and the console is showing no discernible errors. 

Mackbook pro; 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo; NVIDIA GeForce 320M 256 MB; 500 Gig Crucial BX100 drive; 4 GB 1067 MHz DDR3

If you've used some kind of [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and it's not showing any kind ping or packet loss, we probably need to take a much closer look at what might be slowing down these loading screens. Hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help you a lot more one on one!

It is neither of these things; it's the 7.9 Mac release being broken.

Command-tab out of the game and back in as a workaround. It will beachball your computer for a few seconds, but it works.
Same problem! Pls spam tickets, need to make them work!
